item.title: Playable Codex Revamped
item.description:
My Playable Codex mod is riddled with balancing & general issues, so I plan to remake it, starting by a complete rework of the skill tree.

Skill tree

The trees as they are now (2025-12-27) are not really thought out, the new ones are as follow :

Teleporter

Focuses on teleport, damage mitigation and other tricks to redirect damages

Codex Factory

Focuses on cloning, overwhelming enemies with sheer numbers

Run n gun

Focuses on straight shooting and taking out enemies with it’s precision rifle

item.title: Ability Creator
item.description:
The mod

The goal of this mod is to allow any players the ability to create abilities using only configuration.

The config files

Files

The config files are as follows :

  • XComAbilityCreatorEffects.ini
  • XComAbilityCreatorMain.ini

Explanation

XComAbilityCreatorEffects

This file lists all of the effects that can be used to create abilities.

XComAbilityCreatorMain

This file is the main config, where abilities are created.
